Define Documentation

#define REGISTER_TESTS (  tests   )     REGISTER_TESTS_2(tests, AERYN_UNIQUE_NAME(tests))
 

REGISTER_TESTS.

Macro to simplify test registration with the TestRegistry. Rather than creating a global RegisterTests helper, you can chose to use this macro to do it for you (it's largely a matter of taste which one you think is more readable in your code).

To use the macro write something like: 

	   TestCase tests[] =
	   {
	       ...
	   };
	   REGISTER_TESTS(tests)

See also:
TestRegistry
